name: Break The Rules | AI and Games Jam 2021
name_original: Break The Rules | AI and Games Jam 2021
description:
Break The Rules was made for the AI and Games Jam 2021. It is a 3rd person SciFi shooter made by a single developer over seven days. Find more games or follow my progress by checking out DirtyCookStudio.com

Music composed by Sean Patrick

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Shift - Run
  • Esc - Release mouse from game window
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire gun

AI Behavior

  • Enemies Wander
  • Enemies Spawner AI controls how many enemies are spawned and where
  • Enemies can attack either if they see the player or if they are attacked
  • Enemies can call for help to other nearby enemies
